name: Confabulation (itch)
description:
Please post screenshot of achievements you managed to accomplish! 

Controls

WASD - move

Space - interact

Additional Controls

* Arrows work just like WASD

* PL;' work just like WASD - If you'd like to use right hand only (mirrors WASD on the other side of spacebar. )

Made for https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-31

Source: https://github.com/TRy-Dev/Confabulation

Attributions

Fish
